description:
In this course you will learn how to illustrate your future presentations more brain-friendly and appealing for your audience. We start off with lines and move on to shapes, colours etc. so that you are given all the tools you need to put this into practice. In the end you will be able to elaborate your own masterpiece.

I recommend you get permanent markers and coloured wax crayons before you start with this course. This will help achieving optimum results while practising.

If you want to draw onto flipcharts like a professional, get compliments and good word-of-mouth because you stand out from the crowd - this course is perfect for you. Improve your participant's learning results and increase your value as a trainer, teacher, manager or whichever profession you pursue.
title: Brain-friendly flipchart presentation
